content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.

content: Thank you for your participation in this role-play. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please let me know.
name: Evaluator

content: You're welcome! If you'd like to play another round or discuss any other topic, feel free to ask.
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you again for your time. Have a great day!
name: Evaluator
